addFundsModal.title: Ongeramo Amafaranga
addFundsModal.donationInfo: 20% y'ubwizigame bwawe izatangwa ku burezi bw'abana nyuma y'amezi 6. 80% isigaye ni ayawe.

impactCalculator.enterAmountToSee: Andika igiteranyo kugirango urebe ingaruka zawe zishoboka
impactCalculator.everyContribution: Buri musanzu, nubwo ari muto, ufasha gutuma uburezi bugerwa na bose.
impactCalculator.impactEstimates: Ingaruka zateganijwe zishingiye ku giciro gisanzwe mu karere k'abaparineri bacu

emptyState.noTransactionsDesc: Tangira kubaka ubwizigame bwawe wongeramo amafaranga yawe ya mbere. Buri ntambwe igira akamaro mu gukora itandukaniro!
emptyState.noDonationsDesc: Rangiza igihe cyo kubika kugirango ufungure impano kandi utangire gukora ingaruka nyayo ku burezi bw'abana.
emptyState.noResultsDesc: Ntabwo twashoboye kubona ikintu gihura n'ubushakashatsi bwawe. Gerageza guhindura amahitamo cyangwa amagambo yo gushaka.
emptyState.noDataDesc: Nta makuru yo kwerekana. Garuka nyuma!
